articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Go read this report on a fake company that tricked real people into working for it
articles.description: BBC News has just published an investigation into Madbird, a hip new design agency led. The BBC reports that much of its existence was faked and used to lure people into working for free.
articles.content:
Madbird reportedly convinced dozens of employees to work for free
Madbird claimed to be a buzzy London-based design agency.
Image: BBC News
